website_summaries.verdict: Send your kids into the outdoors with a trusty scooter that can handle the elements.
pros: Engineered not just for fun, but to interact with all types of terrain and surfaces
Glides easily over grass and pavement
cons: While versatile in terms of its ability, it could use more power

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately I purchased the Square Trade protection plan and because ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for Christmas last year. I chose the off road model because we live in the country with a long gravel driveway. While it worked well for our area it broke after at the end of the first summer (and he really didn't play with it too much in winter). He only got six months of use out of this. Fortunately I purchased the Square Trade protection plan and because Razor only offers a 90 warranty they are refunding me the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie devine

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a hoverboard for Christmas, but changed his mind after he fell off of his cousin's, so this was the alternative. He rides it to school from our property, across a small trail, and over to the school and we haven't had any issues yet. It's been cold, so he doesn't ride on days where it's expected to be below freezing, but he's ridden it on days where it's above 32, locks it up, and rides it home in the afternoon. It keeps it's charge all day and the wheels do well for where he needs to go. Assembly was easy and fast with our Prime membership. I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Tilson

customer_reviews.title: I have a "like new,used" one for sale, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Should be fun to use not just deadly. Only one speed -FULL ON ! No teen can stay on for more than 5 seconds. I guess if that's the game, see who can stay on longest, like bull riding. Another waste of money. Sits in the corner, all the kids are scared of it. What's really funny is that recently this city has been flooded with thousands of scooter rentals, every store has a stand of a dozen scooters any kid can check out, And take in the street. They Work Correctly ! Just Razor is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Electric Co

customer_reviews.title: Pure Crap
customer_reviews.text: Pure crap! Work great for a month then the battery deteriorated quickly and wouldn't take good charges. Kids loved it while it worked but that didn't last long (< 6 months). I'll never by another one. Extra protection by Asurion was also a total rip-off. The plan doesn't cover out-of-box damage or batteries I was told-- and I'm sure a 100 other things as well. Hate both, never buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robo

customer_reviews.title: Now i have a very disappointed seven-year-old that received this from Santa and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Tires came flat, so i had to take the front tire off only to find a huge rip in the tube. Someone was careless when they are installing the tube into the rim, the rim pinch the tube causing it to tear. Now i have a very disappointed seven-year-old that received this from Santa and I have to explain to him that we have to wait to repair it very disappointing on Christmas Day.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: So fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Love the larger knobby tires and good disk brake. Weigh limit says 150 lbs. That is what i weigh and it carries me up my red granite inclined lane. It was bought for the grandkids and they have a hard time sharing it because it is fast and fun. We are in the country and works fine on dirt paths too. Kickstand is a nice addition. Battery port easily reached for charging. Everything as described. Only have to slip the handlebars in the slot and tighten. Charge up the battery like it says to do, but didnt need it, and have some crazy fun.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well made scooter
customer_reviews.text: I just got it delivered,,fast delivery by USPS,no damage, It is a very nice scooter, looks well made, very easy to finish assembly,only the handle bars and charge it up,i thought the tires would be more aggressive and a bit bigger and wider, since it it called an off road scooter,they have a decent tread, but very narrow and small.but a very nice product, i will update after it gets used ,if it works as good as it is built .im sure its going to get a 5 star review, only 4 now because of the tire size. its a gift, update coming soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total crap. My son is 79#. Bought this to replace E325 (Which needed some new parts) so he can off road which he did anyway with E325. No way the Rx200 goes 12 mph. I’m guessing 5 mph. It acts like it struggles with his weight. But it says it can hold 154#. Also you have to hold the throttle the whole time to go. The moment you take your hand off it stops IMMEDIATELY jolting you forward handle bar in chest! The E325 is way better. We are returning rx200 to third party seller and getting a new E325.
customer_reviews.author: karen beason

customer_reviews.title: Hands downs the best thing I have bought for my son in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands downs the best thing I have bought for my son in a long time. He uses it every day. The kick stand is very sturdy. The green/red light for charging comes in handy to allow him to know when it has obtained a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: MrsJohnson929

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and super fun
customer_reviews.text: These things are so much fun. They are super fast though if you are buying for a kid. We got them for our 8 and 9 year olds. We had them learn to drive them in grass so they wouldn’t hurt themselves if they fell and until they got their confidence up. It does require balance because they’re heavy and are not self standing. We’ve taken them to dirt and rock trails and to parks with grass. The battery runs out quicker but still has a good two hour battery life when used non stop and on various surfaces. I definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: For Reals Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bigger tires would have made this perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is great for riding on gravel or grass for my eight year old. I cant see this working well for the recommended ages of 13+ but maybe on level concrete. It struggles a bit to go up hills with a 65 pound kid on it. Bigger tires I think would help with some of the scrapping issues we have noticed and, would probably give it a bit more traction and ease through grass/dirt/gravel. As long as the battery doesn't crap out in 2 months, I think this is a winner but I bought the protection plan just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works great on dirt and grass!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves it! It rides well, keeps it charge for a good two hours (though maybe not 2 hours of constant use), and feels very durable. We ride it on sidewalks as well as grass and dirt fields and it keeps its speed. The only concern is my son (and his friend who bought one right after us) gets blisters on his fingers where they rub against the handle bar because of the vibration. would be nice if this product could pad the area more where the handles meet the bar. Both boys now wear cycling gloves and its helped prevent more blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Did not run after assembly, and brakes failed
customer_reviews.text: Upon assembly my son could not get it to run. I has to tighten the fuse link. Then it ran for three days and the brakes failed. Something in the caliper snapped. Thankfully this didn't happen upon needing to stop fast or there could have been serious injuries involved. Upon contacting Razor they said "sorry" and that a new caliper will arrive in 2-3 weeks. This only comes with a 90 day factory warranty. Insult to injury Amazon will not replace this bad unit with another, will only ship a different item to replace not the model I ordered. Amazon and Razor both have let me down
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice, works well on grass and on trails.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to use. My son loves it. Most importantly it is the perfect size for 4th/5th grader, the Rx325 was too tall, this one is 8-9" shorter and the power/speed is acceptable. Also he loves the off road features and the "chubby dimpled" tires worked great on grass. Overall this was the perfect Razor scooter for my son. Unfortunately he may new use his unpowered Razor scooter every again. [ASIN:B00SYKYAJU Razor RX200 Electric Off-Road Scooter]]
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Gray

customer_reviews.title: Killer Ride
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this thing. He doesn't think it goes fast enough, but I think its fine. I'm glad we bought this durable version, he's tough on everything. My wife was against buying this because she thought it was too dangerous, but its so natural to drive that he hasn't crashed once. He said it was the best Christmas present ever, partly because it was a complete surprise (he hadn't asked for it). Sometimes Dads thinking out of the box get lucky. Super easy to assemble, but very heavy to lug around. Lots of precautions about how to charge, etc. but it's pretty solid and bulletproof. You can't go wrong with this...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs better throttle
customer_reviews.text: Scooter seems good for a kid but if your kid doesn't wiegh much it takes off a little aggressive because it's full throttle or no throttle, (nothing in-between) I think for this money you should get a variable speed control and throttle. Scooter has good power, it will go up a hill in the dirt with ease. I think it maxes out around 10-13 mph on dirt. And it seems to last about 30- 45minutes on a charge. Takes like 6-8hrs to charge back up.
customer_reviews.author: austin welch

customer_reviews.title: Short-lived extravagance
customer_reviews.text: Good little transport to zip around for short distances. Wanted something that could handle gravel and terrain beyond level pavement. Did well until half the chain guard broke off. Would be better with higher ground clearance. Could benefit from a guard to protect disc brake. Must regularly tighten stem to maintain alignment. Started noticing battery lag after 4 months. Wish it had a variable throttle, instead of a simple on/off throttle. Good gift for a kid, but a bit pricy for how long the battery lasts.
customer_reviews.author: chucka

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge after one month
customer_reviews.text: Fun when it works. Lasted one month. It will not charge anymore. We are out of the return window. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: My kids get a lot of use out of it. The chain guard broke off and Razor replaced it. But the brakes never worked quite right and I tried working with razor for months and they kept sending me parts but never the right part. It seems like it could be a design defect. Considering using the protection plan to get it replaced but the kids do really enjoy it and I'm not sure what they would replace it with.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Amon

customer_reviews.title: Lose wires =short life if unit
customer_reviews.text: These wires are already attached (but too much laxity) by a thin zip tie. After first few hours of use noticed the wires run the fri t tire and have already chewed through the protective coating. Pretty serious design flaw :( I've tried to reach Razor via several routes, unsuccessfully .
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: This product is junk!!!! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product!!!! Do not buy this!!!! Purchased for my 12 year old daughter. Batteries failed within 6 mos. could not get Amazon or Razor to replace it so I purchased replacement batteries through Amazon. Only problem is that Razor designs them so it is impossible to replace the batteries. Awful awful product and Razor is a nightmare of a company to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for youngest grandson for Christmas present. He rode wheels off of it, had to recharge couple of times during weekend. He loves it and was so happy. And it does very well in grass and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Meyer

customer_reviews.title: it's fun. i will update later when we get more ...
customer_reviews.text: my son loves this. it's fun. i will update later when we get more use out of it. it was a christmas gift that has been used only once so far as winter is still on it's way out.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Great for off road riding.
customer_reviews.text: Our grand kids have lived this scooter. We live on a gravel road in the mountains and the they easily ride to the top. We often go walking and the kids ride their scooter. My only recommendation is to take out the warranty that is offered. The throttle quit working on one of them. They didn’t replace it dollar for dollar but it was a bit more than half.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Barkley

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Can't say about longevity as I just gave one to my Grandson. I was impressed at the quality of construction and the weight. Seems to do well with him aboard.
customer_reviews.author: Skypilot 18

customer_reviews.title: Great but utilize safety
customer_reviews.text: Great for someone who is 5’0 and under. Anyone taller this will be awkward to ride. I do recommend being careful with not dropping this on your limbs bc it is very heavy and could cause serious injury. Overall great scooter and delivers on its promises
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: It's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice scooter, holds a good charge, just doesn't have the max speed advertised. Probably max about 7 mph. Kid weighs 52lbs, so it's not over weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Razor RX200 Electric Off-Road Scooter- No speed control- either full speed or nothing.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old is a little nervous about riding this because of the lack of speed control. The full speed from start startles him so it is unfortunately not ridden very much. Other than that its a good scooter. solid but drags the battery compartment on tight turns and over yard bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not truly for "dirt"
customer_reviews.text: Works great for about 4 to 5 months, then got some dirt in it we fixed it started running. Then about a month later when it run it all full battery charge cleaned out everything should be good. Totally quit working
customer_reviews.author: Shelly T.

customer_reviews.title: We love all razor electrics except this one
customer_reviews.text: We love all razor electrics except this one.. it was actually slower off road and smaller then normal rx200. We got our older son the 300 instead and it was cheaper bigger and faster.. skip this one folks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 Year old grandson loves and gets him around hom and the campgrounds with no trbl.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve been great if the brakes worked
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 year old. Would’ve been great if the brakes worked. I can easily change brakes on a car but could not fix these brakes, nor should I have to. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirin Inanloo

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever!!!! My kids love it and could not wait to ride it. On a full charge, they can ride for about an hour to an hour and a half. They enjoy it and from time to time I catch my wife riding it too.
customer_reviews.author: LewBryA

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter. Fast and durable. Plastic cover over the chain and sprocket is a bit vulnerable to breaking if you lean too far to that side while riding (which happened). Replacement is easy though, but best to keep the scooter upright at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Janoski

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the razor E100. This one is far superior. More power. good braking. it has a really long battery life. Goes pretty well off road.
customer_reviews.author: bryson meeks

customer_reviews.title: Most power for the money
customer_reviews.text: We have three different razors and this one is way better than the others. It is the only one that can make it up a hill, and is very fast. The only downside is that it is super noisy.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has the e200 and this one worked out better because the handle bars are just a little shorter
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this scooter. It looks very well built and the battery seems to last a while. My daughter has the e200 and this one worked out better because the handle bars are just a little shorter. I wouldn't exactly call it "off-road", but it does work well on smooth dirt trails.
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter for kids
customer_reviews.text: Has held up pretty well to lots of kids playing on it and even dropping it, running over sticks, etc. I’ll be buying a second one!
customer_reviews.author: t. lily

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift. So far he has really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SCOOTER-EXCEPT FOR THE BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter, however, after about one year (9 months for me) the scooter just died. This, of course, was not posted anywhere on the page when I bought it, nor is it now. I called razor and they said I needed another battery which would cost $65 + s&h. Great scooter butt faulty battery. Just wanted to give you a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Parisian

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter!
customer_reviews.text: Best off road scooter! My 8 yr old daughter LOVES it! She rides it on gravel, grass, dirt and concrete.
customer_reviews.author: crystal sewell

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS A BEAST, CARRIED MY 60LB DAUGHTER ALL DAY LONG ON A SINGLE CHARGE, IT CAN BE PUSHED WITHOUT BEING UNDER POWER. EASY TO RIDE
customer_reviews.author: J.Pressley

customer_reviews.title: The scooter was great. But didn't charge after the 3rd time
customer_reviews.text: The scooter was great. But didn't charge after the 3rd time. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: guest

customer_reviews.title: Acooter
customer_reviews.text: My nine year old loves this. Goes through dirt and grass just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KDLH

customer_reviews.title: Road scooter
customer_reviews.text: The ground clearance is very low so going on rough terrain was out. Even on turns the kickstand drags. Nice and fast for the kids if they want to just go around the road. Definitely doesn’t go off-road.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good for <8 hours & then...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my 10 year old son and after using it for <8 hours in total, the brake stopped working/engaging. Now he can’t safely use it for 7-10 business days while they ship me the part and I have to hope that I can install it. Pretty annoying. Won’t be buying another Razor product.
customer_reviews.author: Shb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it but it is heavy and I recommend supervision just based on weight.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, not as fast as I'd thought.
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Thought it would be faster. Haven't use much do to winter
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this product 5 days before Christmas it came within 2 days of my order packed professionally in a box very easy to put
customer_reviews.text: Santa left us under the tree for my six-year-old son he was a static we took it to the park It's a Wonderful scooter goes on Derek grass pavement really love this product recommended a hundred percent
customer_reviews.author: William cahill

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old loves this and picked up on driving it instantly!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cool Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect activity for restless kids. My 10 y.o. daughter scoots all around our hilly neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: SBM_22202

customer_reviews.title: I got this scooter as a gift for someone. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this scooter as a gift for someone. The teen loves it so much, he has not gotten off it since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pinder

customer_reviews.title: garbage for 270$$$ Single Mom purchase
customer_reviews.text: worked for less than 6 months and just stopped working no apparent reason and its been worked on and still no success after trying everything! garbage for 270$$$ Single Mom purchase!! Thanks Razor!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah stull

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: My Son got this for Christmas and gleefully rode it about 20 times and then it just died mid ride. Power was on and we kept it fully charged. He was so disappointed. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome... Fast as hell but I would definitely recommend purchasing the hill climbing sprocket set off their website
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Battery Problems
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months of sporadic use, battery stays charged for approx 1 min. No help from Razor. Very disappointed in this and service behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scooter. My 6 year old son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J Rad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my video gaming son to get him out the house. I loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you recharge after each use, you will maximize the battery function.
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is perfect for my 12yr old son. As he accompanies my Wife and I on our walks he is always praising the scooters performance on the walkways and trails we take. He has not yet ran the battery out on a single outing.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C.

customer_reviews.title: Runs great tho.
customer_reviews.text: Chain guard broke first day. Came in original product box with picture in front so no surprise Xmas gift. Runs great tho.
customer_reviews.author: C.C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter gets my child outside every day
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yo loves this scooter. It gets him out of the house every single day. He will use it to go to the mailbox and take out the trash :) as well as learning important balance and navigation skills. It’s not great on grass or in sand , but fine on gravel and pavement.
customer_reviews.author: kelley brophy

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for the first 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first 2 weeks. Since then, it travels slower and slower. Now it probably goes approx. 3 m.p.h. causing my son to lose interest. I have tried everything even charging overnight even though the green light is already on. It has gone unused for the last month. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Sam F.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice scooter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew & he LOVES it! Pros: very durable, easy to operate Cons: short runtime & it takes a long time to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Assembly Required!!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my son and now his friends are buying one. Thanks guys !!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Fun but won’t last long. After a week, battery life diminished very fast. Contacted Razor and they said I’d need to return to amazon- not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Edward herring

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. This was a fairly expensive gift. Worked great for about 3 months and my son LOVED it after that it stopped working. We’ve reached out to the manufacturer with no response. My son is so upset but I refuse to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son's 9th birthday, he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 9th birthday, he loves it! It goes just fast enough. My husband will even take it to run down the street.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kids love them. Easily go in our yard and gravel driveway. We bought 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Sturdy / Tons of Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for both of my boys for Christmas. They are durable and sturdy for the dirt roads around our house.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Overall, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great size and speed for 6 1/2 year old boy. Ours had very deflated tires that we can’t seem to fill properly.
customer_reviews.author: NYFarmhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves it! I worried it would be too small but it’s perfect and he definitely has room to grow with it.
customer_reviews.author: mrs4man

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and easy to assemble. We bought the service warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this! It goes almost anywhere and doesn't need to be pushed before the motor kicks in.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Brakes squeel and bearing is shot after 3 to 4 hours of riding by a safe and cautious girl. Not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Not much power or speed for a grown up.
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have a front brake & more speed . Other than that ' it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Allen hume

customer_reviews.title: has good speed, everything works right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, has good speed, everything works right out of the box. Only problem is that, yes it may tote an adult...but the handle bars are fixed so they are too low for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Allen

customer_reviews.title: Chain tension
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is the chain tension broke. We had it for a month. They should add an extra one. But my son loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: I liked that it was easy to put together and charges ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was easy to put together and charges really well. I didn’t like that I had to patch a hole that was in the front tire though and the first time riding it the chain guard fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This razor is awesome! My son loves it and it rides well on all kind of terrain. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Olga C.

customer_reviews.title: Off Road
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good bought for a Winter Birthday so have not been able to ride as much as come spring and summer. Not so good on the ice but seems to go through the dirt well and has some spunk
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Packer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this scooter!!! It’s sturdy, fast and well built. Great Christmas present!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Park

customer_reviews.title: Flat Tire.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the scooter was delivered to us with a hole in the tube. Now we have to order a new tube and wait for it to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mailloux

customer_reviews.title: Off road Fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. He jumps ramps and loves that it is off road and can handle it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken on delivery
customer_reviews.text: The breaks don’t work. Just got it out of the box and already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Safety and quality
customer_reviews.text: We are very please with the electric razor. Easy the assemble and speed is good. We like the slip resisted where her feet stand on.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Faulty inner tube and tire
customer_reviews.text: My daughter rode it for about 5 minutes before the inner tube leaked air and it had a flat. No way to contact seller to replace inner tube. We had to order new inner tube the same day she opened it for a bday gift. We are not super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: tracy schallberger

customer_reviews.title: Grand son LOVE'd it... despite the bruised ...
customer_reviews.text: Grand son LOVE'd it...despite the bruised elbows. Thank God he wears a helmet...# 1 RULE.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: it was easy and with zero problems
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried that this would be a hassle returning this product. To my surprise, it was easy and with zero problems!!! Thank you so much! The new one worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Loree Pounds

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this. Only thing is the charge ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Only thing is the charge only last for about 40 minutes and then takes another 12 hours to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Irving Allen

customer_reviews.title: it was a great deal for only $110
customer_reviews.text: son loves it! it was a great deal for only $110.00. You can ride it on dirt, grass, roads, sidewalks..
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned 10 years old, but it's just right for her. Loved the idea that we choose this scooter over the one that's just for pavement only. Speed over all is great. Not a girlie color but she loves it.

product_meta.title: Razor RX200 Electric Off-Road Scooter
product_meta.description: With the trailblazing new RX200, the ride begins where the pavement ends. Beefed up to withstand tough terrain, the RX200 features off-road tires, disc brake and a new gear ratio for high-torque trail riding, making it off-road ready right out of the gate. Rip up the trails at speeds up to 12 mph (19 kmh). Features: chain-driven motor with new gear ratio for high-torque trail use, rear sprocket drive-train with freewheel for coasting with a run time of up to 40 minutes of continuous use. Also features, a twist-grip throttle and new hand-operated, rear disc brake, a lightweight steel frame and fork, riser style handlebars, soft rubber grips, triple bolt clamp, full deck grip tape, heavy duty alloy wheels with 60 PSI on/off road tires, and a retractable kickstand. Powered be a 24V (two 12V) sealed lead acid, rechargeable battery system, battery charger included. Recommended for ages 13 and older and will support a rider up to 154 pounds. Leave the pavement behind. Our line-up of off-road rides are turning the great outdoors into your personal playground. Built to withstand the punishment of tough trails and rough terrain, these hard-charging, dirt-blasting rides leave the competition in the dust. Read and understand the enclosed owner's manual before riding. The buyer and rider of all Razor scooters are responsible for knowing and obeying all local, state and federal regulations regarding the riding and use of scooters.
feature_bullets: With the trailblazing new RX200, the ride begins where the pavement ends
New off-road version of the classic E200 Electric Scooter that we all know and love
Rip up the trails at speeds up to 12 mph (19 kmh)
Features off-road tires, disc brake and a new gear ratio for high-torque trail riding, making it off-road ready right out of the gate
Recommended for ages 13 and older and will support a rider up to 154 pounds
